steps: Navigate to https://two-test.vcreative.net/#/login
Fill in Email textbox with imail-test+DemoProdDir@vcreativeinc.com
Fill in Password textbox with TeamVC#Rocks2025
Click Login button
Navigate to Spots section
Click 'Create Spot' button
Fill in required spot details
Attach file (.mp3, .mp4, .jpg, .jpeg, .mov, etc.)
Save spot
Go to Notes section of the spot
Click 'Send Email' link
Select one or more attached files to send
Send to imail-test user or yourself
Check your email inbox for notification
Verify the email contains a link to the file
Open the link in a new tab and ensure the file plays correctly
Search for spot with jobUnassigned: 'Producer'
Find the 'Producer' job in the POC column
Click the parent 'poc-job-container' element
Type the assignee name (e.g., 'demo prod director') in the search field
Click the dropdown item to assign
Verify the job-completed field shows the assigned name (e.g., 'Demo Prod Director')
